summary:
This is a *cheat* for who, like me, hate gathering quests. 
The bat will give you all the items to complete generic gathering quests in Riften.
descriptionHtml:
This is a *cheat* for who, like me, hate gathering quests. 
The bat will give you all the items to complete generic gathering quests in Riften. 

Place in your main \\Skyrim directory, in game open console and write \"bat riftenquests\"


In detail, you\'ll get:


20 Deathbells, Ninroots, Nightshades for the gal in the alchemy shop
3 Flawless Amethyst for the Argonian in the inn
1 Gold Ore, 1 Mammoth Tusk, 2 Flawless Sapphires for the argonian jeweler
10 Fire Salts for the blacksmith
5 Ice Wraith Teeth for the meat vendor
author: Kitako
